meanings.definition: The property of having the same extension or reference.
meanings.sent1: The extensionality of the two terms ensures they refer to the same thing.
meanings.sent2: In logic, extensionality is crucial for determining equality between sets.
meanings.sent3: The extensionality of the situation made everyone laugh at the mix-up.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness had an extensionality that reached everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The extensionality of the map made it easy to navigate the city streets.

meanings.definition: The principle that two things are identical if they have the same properties.
meanings.sent1: Understanding extensionality helps in recognizing identical characteristics.
meanings.sent2: The concept of extensionality simplifies the comparison of objects.
meanings.sent3: The extensionality of the twins' behavior was uncanny.
meanings.sent4: His extensionality with the famous actor made him a star in his own right.
meanings.sent5: The extensionality of their tastes made them the perfect foodie duo.
